name: nsrdude
text: To win the GOF you must kick more than 3 asses.

name: cbtbone
text: this strategy did make much sense at the time.

name: theloneliestmonkey
text: Slap, Dap

name: soupytwist
text: Pouf, Slif

name: overmedicated
text: KRAK!

name: saint
text: chatter chatter chatter chatter...

name: professorhazard
text: KOODGE

name: homepie
text:
snifff...
snifff...
SNFFFFFZZ!

name: beansdooma
text: sniff snaff snoof

name: ted0phile
text: Jesus H. Christ

name: cpnglxynchos
text: that is not an onomatopoeia.

name: phantomsword
text: It can if you just Believe !

name: shinkusan
text: jeeeesisachhkriest

name: dersquirrel
text: squeeee

name: soticoto
text: KAPOW!!

name: flynn
text: That is a sick move.

name: phthoggos
text: God damn this strip is heartbreaking.

name: jaldor
text: For a guy with a Max avatar you sure do have an aversion to wanton violence.

name: jaminspoon
text: That this comment did not even have a second chubby before I came along decries the foul state of our race.

name: catachresis
text: Panel (counts slowly) 13 is beautiful. You can feel how Beef is being totally genuine. This is brain tape from small times, and he is finally here.

name: hellaedgar
text: Are you raw enough to beat down your oldest friend? (I am not.)

name: charchar
text: My oldest friend can tear through aluminum cans with her teeth.  This is not a question of my soul being raw, but of my spine.

name: soticoto
text:
Whoa. Hot.
Could you introduce me?

name: tekende
text: It doesn't matter; I'm not strong enough to beat down my oldest friend.

name: zyrelax
text: Fugue to Berserk-  "That's like comparin' a lunatic to a pissed man with goals."

name: thespoof
text: this is the greatest achewood line

name: jamb23
text:
The goals of a pissed man (English US): turning the men who beat up your best friend into cowboy sauce
The goals of a pissed man (English UK): chatting up the pub owner's daughter and passing out on top of a half-eaten kebab

name: darkwaffle
text: This strip taught me a new word.

name: tekende
text: Was it "goals"?

name: luke_johnson
text:
In panel thirteen beef uses punctuation !

That's a thing right there.

name: cleave
text: A comment left by cleave was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by katsura, Ariamaki, _cheesekayke, Wulvaine, yingkaixing, STUART)

name: riazm
text:
Beef took a spare set of woodwork goggles to plant on the ground so that Ray would think he has been taken out.

The kid had this whole damn thing laid out.

name: connellingus
text: I think it's the same set of goggles. You can see that it now has the cracks in it that first appeared when Ray found them on the ground.

name: luckyg
text: That's a pretty extensive statement to just "let slip".

name: stuart
text:
What was your childhood like?

"Well, in my youth I had seven sisters who would pin me down and dress me in a pink frilly tutu- I MEAN DIDN'T HAVE"

name: pitseleh
text: I would be so honored to have Beef as my best friend. He's loyal to the max. A true blue dude.

name: riazm
text: That kick is actually largely ornamental, the psychologically demeaning lines preceding it are what really destroyed Cava.

name: cailetshadow
text: If lightning strikes a rotten tree and it collapses, it's not the fault of the lightning

name: jlynes
text: Sure, blame the victim.

name: weekendofsound
text: Yeah, but the kick has some style

name: dasilodavi
text: Dap

name: imbeta
text:
Nice combo!

A string of Verbal abuse followed by a well placed flying roundhouse... the crowd would go wild.

name: luckypyjamas
text:
he didn't even look pissed about what ray was saying.

just sad.

name: zem
text: that's shock

name: paco
text: The verbal blow Ray dealt him was the equivalent of a metal baseball bat with nails welded on to the temple. The look you see on Rudy's face is the look of a man dead and standing.

name: terriblerobot
text: Why did this post instantly remind me of the part in "Ender's Game" where he cold kills that dude in the bathroom? Chubby for random memory spike.

name: miku224
text: Same here, man! Although I did reread Ender's Game a few months back. I cycle back to it probably once a year. Totally a defining book for me.

name: falseprophet
text: I love how Beef calls defeating Ray last a way to get "much style points," like a skateboarding video game. And Onstad, as if reading my mind, immediately has Ray use the word "tricky" in the next panel. I think that's from SSX or Jet Set Radio Future or something.

name: pyro_ike
text: I love Beef's definition of "berserk".  I can definitely see charging vikings as pissed men with goals.

name: eatmorekix
text: i feel pretty sad for Rudy Cava

name: qeramah
text: Ray has his left hand in his thong while giving Rudy Cava a flying roundhouse kick to the face. Rude.

name: saru
text: I see that as a sort of kung fu hand thing.

name: ortsac
text: I just noticed the JESUS H. CHRIST in the midst of Ray's "chatter"s. cool.

name: firesign
text:
Nice.
...does using it as onomatopoeia count as "in vain"...? I really don't think that's ever come up before...

name: baryonyx
text: The fourth row down is just...elegant.

name: dwodles
text: Ray and Beef are the so rude in this arc. I've given every strip a 5.

name: evolume
text: Reminds me of Fighter Hayabusa's deadly Back-Brain Kick.

name: hateandwar
text:
A WINNER IS YOU!

CHALLENGE NEXT MATCH!

name: direhaggis
text: I don't know. I am a full-throated advocate for Ray, but there is something special and different about a final fight. Dude such as Rudy Cava comes up, face caked with the blood of lesser men, eyebrows all aglow with determination. It seems like that last match is just straight up about beating the shit out of each other. No words. No strategy. No intellectual feints. Just one final, clear act of brutality.

name: doomchild
text:
Offering to dress someone up in the hopes that their father will molest them isn't brutal?

DC

name: kovatch
text: I'm Miranda and i don't like commenting because im a lazy woman

name: talbain
text:
Ray is a master of cruelty.

There are some places you just shouldn't go, especially when you're just going to kick ass in a second.

name: jhunter
text: Ray maligned his manhood and then kicked him in the temple. His body may recover, but his pride is on life support and slipping fast.

name: mnemodomi
text: 5 for dap

name: nyl
text: Harsh! What the fuck, Ray!?

name: king-jim
text: Ray's patter is TOO harsh

name: tekende
text:
That picture of Beef from behind with his arms raised is used several times during this arc, but I'd never really noticed until I read the book. It becomes very obvious when art is reused, and a lot of art is reused in this arc.

Not that I'm criticising Onstad or anything. It just interested me.

name: genequagmire
text: Ouch.

name: abe
text: Like comparin' Charlie Manson to Lee Harvey Oswald.

name: fineoakstructure
text:
Huh? Neither ever killed anyone.

...

name: billy_pilgrim
text: Rudy, Rudy, your hair is a mess

name: miku224
text: Rudy, Rudy, you tore your dress
